entry.title: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor, Straight Cut, Double Extra Long Handle, Gold
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merkur
Type: Double Edge Safety Razors
Price: 45.00

This double-edge razor can be seen as a longer version of the 23C which was made at the customer's request. With its extra-long handle, you gain freedom and range of movement. You can relax when shaving even the most delicate areas. The thin handle gets its high grip through a diamond-shaped cross-knurl.

    The rendition of this Merkur classic features modifications for enhanced grip. With an elongated handle and vintage finish crafted from famously durable steel, your customers can confidently purchase this best-selling product that will not rust.

    PROPERTIES

    Material - Brass handle, die-casted zinc razor head, galvanized surfaces, PVD coating in rose gold on chrome-plating

    Product Details - Closed comb, straight

    Locking system - Short screw, three-piece safety razor

    Handle Diameter - 1

    Dimensions - 4.2 cm x 2.5 cm x 12.6 cm

    Packaging - Carton box with window

    Honorably made in Solingen, Germany.
entry.s:tag: Double Edge Safety Razors for Retail

entry.title: Merkur Super Platinum Double Edge Safety Razor Blades (Single Pack, 10 Blades/Pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merkur
Type: Razor Blades
Price: 5.75

These razor blades are a true classic and have withstood the test of time. They are specially designed to meet the requirements of Merkur safety razors. Individually wrapped in paraffin paper, these razors are ready for you to safely break them and put them to use!

DETAILS:
  • Traditional double edge razor 
  • Stainless steel, platinum-coated
  • Offered in 10-pack or 100-pack

OVERVIEW
Blades are a very subjective grooming product, so finding your right one is a process. Merkur puts a reputable entry into the running with these traditional double edge razor blades. Made of stainless steel and platinum-coated for comfort and protection, this blade graces the razors of many wet-shaving fanatics. Merkurs fit all standard double edge razors. They come individually wrapped in boxes of 10 blades.

MADE IN CZECH REPUBLIC

entry.title: Merkur Detailing Razor Blades (10 Blades/Pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merkur
Type: Razor Blades
Price: 5.50

These razor blades are designed exclusively for the 907 detailing safety razor. Tailor-made and designed for detail shaving around the eyebrows, mustache, and other detail areas, these blades have a unique trapezoidal shape that has both a narrow and wide edge. They truly are perfect for even the trickiest spots!

DETAILS:

  • Trapezoidal razor blade
  • Offered in 10-pack or 100-pack

OVERVIEW
These specialty MK-908A double edge razor blades are the perfect pairing for the specially designed 907 Detailing razor. The special trapezoidal blade is made of C95 carbon steel, chosen because it supports the desired properties of the Merkur No. 907 in the best possible way: blades with a Rockwell hardness of 66 HRC are not very elastic and therefore advantageous for precise trimming of eyebrows and beard contours. Comes individually wrapped in boxes of 10 blades or available in a 100 pack.

MADE IN SOLINGEN GERMANY

Price: 43.00

A tribute to classical shaving, the Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor is an essential that exceeds the expectations of those who use it. Remaining faithful to industrial craftsmanship, this product is easy to pair with other products that entice the fine shaving connoisseur.

This Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor has an eye-catching lustrous chrome finish that is both alluring and powerful. Crafted in Solingen, Germany, this straight edge and closed comb razor has a rich heritage of quality shaving that dates back to the Vikings. Easy to maintain, the 2 piece element ensures you can clean and implement the blade of your choice, featuring:

  • Two pieces 
  • Straight edge
  • Fixed blade
  • Closed comb
  • Weighted handle

While shaving experiences vary for baby boomers and millennials, quality standards don't. Featuring this gleaming safety razor is a flawless addition to any bundle of fine shaving products or simply on its own, this Merkur classic is guaranteed to swoon either generation of shoppers. 

Made in Solingen, Germany.

entry.summary:

Type: Adjustable Double Edge Safety Razors

  • Two pieces
  • Straight bar
  • Adjustable blade
  • Closed-comb

This heavy-duty, double-edged safety razor is yet another indestructible Merkur product. Adjustable to suit all types of facial hair and scruff with a snap closure, this matte finish is an excellent choice for customers seeking a tremendously firm grip.

Made in Solingen, Germany.
